plays.text: Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Holding Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Michal Handzus 2 minutes for Holding Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Roughing Shane Doan
Penalty to Mike Sullivan 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Nicklas Lidstrom assisted by Igor Larionov and Luc Robitaille
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Tripping Landon Wilson
Penalty to Landon Wilson 2 minutes for Slashing Brendan Shanahan
Goal scored by Daymond Langkow assisted by Shane Doan and Claude Lemieux
